page.title: 20Tourism in the Tenby Area
page.content: The accomodation available for the tourists varies a great deal.Tenby has its large old Victorian Hotels, and large Guest Houses .Self catering is available throughout the area,in properties which can vary from a large detatched residence,to bungalows, cottages and flats. Another popular form of self catering holidays are the camping and caravan parks.The local land owners and farmers cater for the needs of this section in tourism. The holiday season has been lengthend to start from early spring to late autumn.A large number of the Hotels now offer Winter Weekend Breaks to encourage visitors to the area during the winter. This area depends on Tourism for its livelyhood,it is the main industry.
